DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study evaluate effect extract flour ferment Bacillus subtilis var natto DC-15 postprandial glucose level subject prediabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Extract Flour Fermented With Bacillus Subtilis Var Natto DC-15 Postprandial Glucose
DOC.criteria: Fasting plasma glucose 110125 mg/dL Taking antidiabetic drug Taking drug functional food may affect blood glucose level Pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease History severe disease and/or major surgery
